titles.title: A bill to designate the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the "Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
A bill to designate the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the "Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Designates the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
